conversations.user:
Kiro, we need to make an app for Kiroween.
They have four categories: Resurrection, Frankenstein, Skeleton Crew, Costume Contest—and I have a ton of ideas.
I saw their promo video and it looks like they expect something MS Paint x Minesweeper.
Everyone's going to do the same thing with Paint, Notepad, cute little pumpkins.
So why don't we skip that predictable route and make something that hits all four categories at once and actually wins.

user:
…Wait. Ohhh. I see what you're doing. Frankenstein… resurrected… skeletons chasing… Nice punning on the categories.
But Kiro… this is too cutesy. Too simple. Too damn cliché.
Every Halloween submission is full of bats, skeletons, smiling pumpkins, candies — how is that real Halloween?

They say you're fast. They say you make life easy.
Well? Where is that Kiro?
Because right now all I see is… more of the same.

The judges won't give us all four prizes.
I want first place. I need something real.
Something scary.
Something that actually feels like Kiroween.

Today's the 20th. I've scrapped all my MS Paint × Notepad ideas.
Everyone's gonna do cute Halloween crap.
I've got a wedding on Dec 1. Ten days, Kiro.
Don't be useless.
I know you can do better.
